html

<div class="form-text-button-input">
  <label for="real-reference" class="form-label">some label</label>
  <input id="real-reference" type="text" class="text-box " placeholder="some label">

    hit me
  </button>
</div>

scss

.form-text-button-input {
    width:         300px;
    box-sizing:    border-box;
    padding:       5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;

    .newsletter-form & {
        width: 100%;
    }

}

css

.form-text-button-input {
    width: 300px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    padding: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
}

.newsletter-form .form-text-button-input {
    width: 100%;
}
